metadata.title: CVE-2024-42369 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: matrix-js-sdk is a Matrix messaging protocol Client-Server SDK forJavaScript. A malicious homeserver can craft a room or room structure suchthat the predecessors form a cycle. The matrix-js-sdk'sgetRoomUpgradeHistory function will infinitely recurse in this case,causing the code to hang. This method is public but also called by the'leaveRoomChain()' method, so leaving a room will also trigger the bug.This was patched in matrix-js-sdk 34.3.1.

criterions.comment: node-matrix-js-sdk package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
